question: Who has been appointed as Secretary of Department of School Education and Literacy?
explanation: I&B Secretary Amit Khare, Â an IAS officer of 1985 batch from Jharkhand cadre, has been given the additional charge of Secretary of Department of School Education and Literacy in Ministry of Human Resources Development (HRD).
